The encrypted SD card must be decrypted before being used. Decryption could take an hour or more. Start with a charged battery and keep device plugged in until decryption is complete. Interrupting decryption process may cause some or all data to be lost.

This app is using the full screen. Swipe gestures for navigation will show the status bar. To navigate, swipe again while the status bar is visible.

"This app is using the full screen. The Home, Back, and Recents buttons are hidden to minimize distractions and to prevent you from leaving the app accidentally.
Even if you rotate your phone, the buttons will always be located next to the charging port. You can make the buttons reappear by swiping inward from the edge of the screen as shown by the arrow."

"This app is using the full screen. The Home, Back, and Recents buttons are hidden to minimize distractions and to prevent you from leaving the app accidentally.
To make the buttons reappear, swipe up from the bottom of the screen as shown by the arrow."

Moisture has been detected in your charger/USB port. To remove the moisture, follow the tips below.
Shake your phone to remove moisture from the port.
It may take several hours for moisture in the port to dry.
You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) toward the port.

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean, the moisture is gone, and the notification is cleared.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port."

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean, the moisture is gone, and the notification is cleared.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port.
In the meantime, you can charge your phone wirelessly."
"Moisture has been detected in your charger/USB port. Make sure it's dry before charging your phone."
"Moisture has been detected in your charger/USB port. Make sure it's dry before charging your phone. It may take some time to dry completely."
